name: JUMP - a game made for your space bar
name_original: JUMP - a game made for your space bar
description:
PLEASE START IN FULLSCREEN MODE FOR BEST EXPERIENCE - game not optimized for smaller screen sizes

Controls are space bar and arrow keys (or wasd). Made in 72 hours for gamejam practice. Will update this for a couple more days until my next gamejam or get bored :D Enjoy.

Just jump up and avoid the obstacles and try to balance yourself on the moving platforms.
